description:
Dash is a friendly robot with a lot of personality.  
Let's press the buttons to see how Dash responds!

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn on magenta lights.

hints.description: Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on lights, make Dash laugh when the top button is pressed. Then make Dash automatically turn on magenta lights again.
puzzles.introduction:
They say laughter is the best medicine.  
Let's give Dash a healthy dose!

hints.description: Link the Magenta light to the Laugh state using a Top Button Pressed cue. Link the Laugh state to the Magenta light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on lights, make Dash give a kiss when button 1 is pressed. Then make Dash automatically turn on magenta lights again.
puzzles.introduction: Dash thinks that if you like someone, you should let them know.

hints.description: Link the light to the Kiss state using a Button 1 Pressed cue. Link the Kiss state to the light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on lights, make Dash push when button 2 is pressed. Then make Dash automatically turn on magenta lights again.
puzzles.introduction: Life isn't always a bunch of roses and kisses.  Sometimes Dash feels a little pushy.

hints.description: Link the light to the Push state using a Button 2 Pressed cue. Link the Push state back to the light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on lights, make Dash burp when button 3 is pressed. Then make Dash automatically turn on magenta lights again.
puzzles.introduction: When something is bothering you, Dash thinks it can be a big relief to get things out of your system!

hints.description: Link the light to the Burp state using a Button 3 Pressed cue. Link the Burp state back to the light using an Auto cue.
